availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Joseph H. McCann (Louisville, Kentucky, clerk and musician)

body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, clerk and musician. Maryland native. Married to Emily Laviolette McCann in Jefferson County, Kentucky, on October 8, 1855. Vocalist in Louisville in 1858. Clerk in Louisville in 1860. Clerk in Louisville in 1861. Musician in Louisville from 1863 though 1865.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville, District 6, p. 367.

"A Musical Feast," The Louisville Daily Journal, (Louisville, KY), September 22, 1864, p. 3.
